tsyncid.%comment%: Unique Identifier for animating scene synchronously based on a trigger

tsOntrigger.%comment%: True or false flag if this is a triggered animation based an action

SyncObjList.%comment%: List of objects are animated in a timeline that are triggered Synchronously

tSyncNote.%comment%: place holder for additional notes for Sync object

ntsyncid.%comment%: Unique Identifier for animating scene synchronously based on a non trigger

ntsOntrigger.%comment%: True or false flag if this is a non triggered animation based an action

ntSyncObjList.%comment%: List of objects are animated in a timeline that are non triggered ASynchronously

ntSyncNote.%comment%: place holder for additional notes for Sync object

tasyncid.%comment%: Unique Identifier for animating scene asynchronously based on a trigger

taOntrigger.%comment%: True or false flag if this is a triggered animation based an action

tAsyncObjList.%comment%: List of objects are animated in a timeline that are triggered ASynchronously

tAsyncNote.%comment%: place holder for additional notes for ASync object

ntasyncid.%comment%: Unique Identifier for animating scene asynchronously based on a non trigger

ntaOntrigger.%comment%: True or false flag if this is a non triggered animation based an action

ntAsyncObjList.%comment%: List of objects are animated in a timeline that are non triggered ASynchronously

ntAsyncNote.%comment%: place holder for additional notes for ASync object

routine.%comment%: To mention a repeated routine of timeline actions

order.%comment%: Order of items in a routine, mention the routine ids in a sequence to understand the order of events.
